description: SkyPatrol creates GPS and cellular-enabled solutions for tracking and optimizing vehicle activities. Its integrated hardware and location-based software solutions are tailored to vehicular financiers, fleet managers, car dealerships, auto rental companies seeking to reduce risk, lower cost, and increase the accountability of their mobile assets.

SkySpecs automates the time-consuming and dangerous inspection, diagnostics, and maintenance of utility-scale wind turbines through the use of an automated drone inspection service and analytics platform that allows for repeatability, high-quality data, and safer inspections.
Smart Medical Services offers corporate clients customized and discounted health care plans.
Smartick is an online learning program that helps children reach their potential by using mathematics to increase mental agility, calculation skills, concentration, and studying methods.
SmartMessage is an omni-channel digital marketing software company that helps enterprise clients to schedule, launch, and analyze omnichannel marketing campaigns from a single centralized platform.
Snapcart applies AI to build an offline database of users in emerging markets, enabling brands like P&G, Unilever and Danone to engage shoppers in real-time.
Softec International provides end-to-end visibility and command & control solutions for commercial fleets.
SoftGroup provides an end-to-end mass serialization solution for pharmaceutical manufacturers and distributors of all sizes.
Softomotive provides Robotic Process Automation (RPA) products and services. The company was acquired by Microsoft in 2020.
Softruck develops mobile fleet monitoring solutions across South America, focusing on real-time visibility using AI-enabled software.
SolarizEgypt finances, designs, installs, and commissions PV solar power plants for commercial, industrial, and residential electricity consumers.
Solinftec has developed a set of tech-solutions, including proprietary hardware, telemetry communications, and a SaaS platform, that help farmers track and monitor the progress of their operations.

description: SoLo Funds is a peer-to-peer lending marketplace for micro loans.
Solubio provides on-farm biological management for farmers, enabling them to produce their own biological pesticides on site and reduce costs.
SOS Asistencia offers assistance services for home insurance providers, retailers, businesses, and individuals.
SosTariffe is a price comparison website in Italy across 12 service categories including broadband, utilities and insurance. The company was acquired by Mutuionline in 2020.
Soundreef is the first private European company that collects and distributes music royalties on behalf of artists and publishers.
Souqalmal is a financial comparison site, enabling consumers to compare credit cards, personal loans, insurance plans, mortgages, mobile phone plans, and car loans.

SPARK Schools provides transformational education innovation through a blended learning model, which elevates student achievement and provides the tools teachers need to serve their students effectively.
Grupo Spira is a professional services firm offering tailored employee training programs focused on performance improvement rather than knowledge acquisition.
